Package ohos.bluetooth

Class BluetoothDeviceClass.MajorMinorClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.BluetoothDeviceClass.MajorMinorClass
  • Enclosing class:
    BluetoothDeviceClass

    public static class BluetoothDeviceClass.MajorMinorClass
extends Object
    Defines the bit mask values of all major and minor classes. To obtain the device class, call BluetoothDeviceClass.getMajorMinorClass().
    Since:
    3
